title: Introductions
description:
Information about Introductions can be found at:

* <https://cfpb.github.io/design-manual/global-elements/text-introductions.html>
* <https://cfpb.github.io/design-manual/global-elements/item-introduction.html>

The text introduction component is the standard page introduction component used across all pages that do not have a [hero](https://cfpb.github.io/design-system/components/heroes) or item introduction.

On [landing](https://cfpb.github.io/design-system/templates/landing-pages) or [sub-landing pages](https://cfpb.github.io/design-system/templates/sublanding-pages), the text introduction may be accompanied by a breakout sidebar to highlight a specific piece of content from the section.

The item introduction component is a variation of the text introduction component used on pages found in filterable lists such as blog posts, press releases, or documents.
